Class bot

my.uum.bot
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.generics.LongPollingBot, org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.generics.TelegramBot
public class bot extends org.telegram.telegrambots.bots.TelegramLongPollingBot
This class is to implement the telegram bot with function add room, booking room, cancel booking and display user booking information
